mapper.insert: insert into DOWNDATASETLOG (item_id, login_user, creation_date, dataset_uid, dataset_name, down_path, down_date) values (#{item_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{login_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creation_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{dataset_uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataset_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{down_path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate)
